en.label: Roshar Calendar (Stormlight Archive)
en.description: The Vorin calendar used on Roshar in Brandon Sanderson's Stormlight Archive series. Features a 500-day year with ten months of fifty days each, organized into ten weeks of five days per month. The calendar includes special periods: The Weeping (four weeks of constant rain marking year's end) and Midpeace (four weeks at mid-year with no highstorms). Uses the unique Year.Month.Week.Day date format.

events.name: The Weeping
events.description: Four weeks of constant rain and no highstorms marking the transition between years. Gemstones cannot be infused with Stormlight during this period, except on Lightday.

events.name: Midpeace
events.description: Four weeks with no highstorms occurring at the midpoint of the year. The Middlefest fair in Jah Keved is traditionally held during this time.
